trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> class is an abstract class used as the base class for all <see cref="N:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols" /> exceptions.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> è una classe astratta utilizzata come classe base per tutte le eccezioni <see cref="N:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" />.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio visualizzato nel client quando viene generata l'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> class using the specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.String)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> mediante il parametro specificato.

trans-unit.source: The serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: Dati dell'oggetto serializzato relativi all'eccezione generata.

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni contestuali sull'origine o sulla destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> class using the specified serialization information and streaming contextual information.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> utilizzando le informazioni di serializzazione e le informazioni contestuali di flusso specificate.

trans-unit.source: The message displayed to the client when the exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio visualizzato nel client quando viene generata l'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />, if any, that threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: Eventuale proprietà <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> che ha generato l'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> class using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryException" /> utilizzando i parametri specificati.
